chinese: 你怎么想?
english: What do you think?

chinese: 我想这里有东西卡住了.
english: I think something's caught in here.

chinese: 我是说, 你对竞选是怎么想的?
english: I mean, what do you think of running?

chinese: 竟选公职?
english: For office?

chinese: 不, 参加Boston马拉松. 是的, 是竟选公职.
english: No, Boston Marathon. Yes, for office.

chinese: 我不知道. 我喜欢我的工作.
english: I'm not sure. I love my job.

chinese: 但是, 我已经在那里干了8年了.
english: But, I've been there for eight years.

chinese: 也许是该离开的时候了.
english: Maybe it's time to move on.

chinese: 也许是换新工作的时候了.
english: Maybe it's time for a new job.

chinese: Ah, 但是你必须先当选, 才算是得到了这份新工作.
english: Ah, but you won't know you have this job until the election.

chinese: 说得对. You know, 我以前从来没想过做公职.
english: True. You know, the thought of public office never occurred to me.

chinese: 但自从接到Constanza的电话之后, 我就在想这事.
english: But ever since Constanza's phone call, it's been on my mind.

chinese: 你的意见呢?
english: What do you think?

chinese: 我认为那东西不该放在那里.
english: I don't think that goes there.

chinese: 皮带不是应该放在那里吗?
english: Isn't the belt supposed to go there?

chinese: Well, 我想那会很令人兴奋.
english: Well, I think it's very exciting.

chinese: 但我也很担忧.
english: But I'm worried too.

chinese: 我是说, 这对我们都会有很大的影响.
english: I mean, this will have an enormous effect on all of us.

chinese: 比如说, 我们的生活在竞选过程中肯定会发生变化.
english: For instance, our lives will certainly change during a campaign.

chinese: 你在听吗?
english: Are you listening?

chinese: 比如说, 我们的生活在竞选过程中肯定会发生变化.
english: For instance, our lives will certainly change during a campaign.

chinese: 你又来了.
english: You're doing it again.

chinese: 什么?
english: What?

chinese: 你重复我所说的话, 但却没有真正听进去.
english: You repeat what I say, but you don't really hear it.

chinese: 亲爱的, 你认为我只有看着你才听得见.
english: Sweetheart, you think I can't hear unless I look at you.

chinese: 但事实上, 我是用耳朵听, 而不是用眼睛听.
english: But in fact, I use my ears to listen, not my eyes.

chinese: 我闭着眼晴也听得见你说的话.
english: I can even hear you with my eyes closed.

chinese: 接着讲. 说点什么.
english: Go ahead. Say something.

chinese: 真拿你没办法.
english: You're impossible.

chinese: 拿我没办法. 你瞧?
english: I'm impossible. See?
